name: Galactic Scrapyard
description:
Controls-

LMB- Click and drag to pull objects

MMB- Click to Delete Tethers

RMB- Click and drag to create tethers

Spacebar- Far Zoom out

Scroll Wheel- Zoom out and Zoom In

Module Info:
Cannon: Fires projectiles at enemies at medium range.
Laser: Rapid-fires projectiles at close enemies.
Repair Generator: Repairs itself and other modules.
Reactor: Provides a power field that allows other modules to function.
Gravity Core: Creates a field that improvees your gravity thrust power, allowing you to move faster.

Objective_

Build your ship

Collect resources and turrets to fight off enemies

Collect 5 crystal core to win
